text: The following lists events that happened in 1975 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Kristján Eldjárn *Prime Minister - Geir Hallgrímsson ==Events== *24 October - Women's Strike ==Births== Jónsi *12 March - Sigmundur Davíð Gunnlaugsson, politician. *23 April - Jónsi, guitarist and vocalist *7 May - Árni Gautur Arason, footballer *15 may - Ólafur Örn Bjarnason, footballer *10 July - Stefán Karl Stefánsson, actor *10 September - Barði Jóhannsson, musician, writer, TV show host, film director and clothing designer *16 October - Brynjar Gunnarsson, footballer ===Full date missing=== *Heimir Björgúlfsson, artist ==Deaths== Gunnar Gunnarsson *22 August - Guðrún frá Lundi, poet and novelist (b. 1887) *21 November - Gunnar Gunnarsson, writer (b. 1889) ==References== Category:1970s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1975 in Iceland
